/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a distance, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings. The colors in the image are vivid and bright, adding to the overall lively atmosphere of the scene.
